All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AbstractError
This abstract class serves as a base class for defining error dialogs in the Weather application UI.
App
 
AppUI
This class represents the user interface of the weather application and acts as main user interface.
Colors
This class represents a color scheme for the weather application.
CurrentWeather
This class represents the current weather conditions obtained from the OpenWeatherMap API.
Daily
 
Daily.Temperature
 
Location
This class retrieves the user's current location information (latitude and longitude) based on their IP address.
RefreshButton
This class provides a utility method to create a JButton representing a refresh button.
Token
 
Weather
 
WeatherApiKey
The WeatherApiKey class represents an API key used for accessing weather data.
WeatherDetail
 
WeatherDetailsPanel
This class is responsible for creating a weather details panel that displays information about the current weather and daily forecast.
WrongToken
This class represents a specific error dialog displayed when the user's OpenWeatherMap API token is not found or invalid.
